website_summaries.verdict: A sweet and creamy treat that appeals to a variety of birds.
pros: Real pieces of dried papaya dipped in creamy mango flavored yogurt
Perfect as a snack or mixed into regular food
Ideal for cockatiels, conures, parrots, and parakeets
cons: Bottom of the bag is filled with small crumbs, so can be quite messy near the end

customer_reviews.title: "The treats are the perfect thickness, and taste great." - My Genius Bird
customer_reviews.text: Yes indeed. The thickness is optimal. Amazon wants to know how I feel about this bird treat's thickness? Truly correct and non-overly-thin. Yep. Good thickness. Flavor is great. Tasted it myself. Okay but on a serious note, this is a good value. My birds haven't tried it yet, I'd never eat a bird treat myself, and what even IS the thickness of this thing? What does it want to know? Whatever, it's fruit covered in something sugary, my birds will lose their minds over it I'm sure. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: My cockatiels refuse to eat it
customer_reviews.text: They didn't like it, I wanted them to enjoy the special treat but it just sits in their dish. They enjoy their millet as a treat or those honey sticks better.
customer_reviews.author: erinmichelle7

customer_reviews.title: Kaytee Fiesta Mango Bird Treats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these treats for my Zebra and Society Finches but none of them ate it. They simply tossed it out or it fell through the wires so the treats turned out to be a very wasteful product for me. I like Kaytee products and this is suppose to be for my size birds but I won't be buying it again. Sorry, but my experience will not let me recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doris S.

customer_reviews.title: My birds would not eat these
customer_reviews.text: I could not get any of my 4 parrots to eat these. I have 2 quackers and 2 conures, I'm not sure why but none of them liked the taste. They seemed soft and fragrant though.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not For Parakeets Or Small Birds
customer_reviews.text: The food are very big for my bird to eat, they pick it up and throw it all around the cage. And that’s why I think this is not for small birds like parakeets because they can’t eat it it’s too big for them so they won’t eat it, only the small grains they can eat.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: I'm not impressed with price or performance
customer_reviews.text: This product is expensive. It's similarly priced to most bird treats, but that's not a good thing. Both of my Green cheek conures didn't care for it. They can be picky and don't like a lot of the treats I've tried so off to try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Wdryden

customer_reviews.title: Birb approved.
customer_reviews.text: These are over 5 dollars in PetSmart. My birds love them. I only buy treats and millet from Amazon plus it has 2 day delivery. They smells so good when my kids after one before I told her they were for the fids :)
customer_reviews.author: Lnggr65

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 green cheek conures and only 2 have shown interest in these treats. The pieces are extremely small and almost fall apart immediately when they start to eat them. I'm on the fence as to whether or not to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ding Ding

customer_reviews.title: Smell and look so good!
customer_reviews.text: These smell and look so good (photos do not do it justice)! My birds were skeptical at first but after the first bite, they were "hooked" and wanted more! Definitely a repeat purchase need
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Parakeets don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Got this to add sime fruit into my parakeets diet but they refuse to eat it . I've tried multiple times . I have a total 6 parakeets and the whole bag went to waste
customer_reviews.author: DenaAnn Johns

customer_reviews.title: My Quaker Parrot LOVES these treats
customer_reviews.text: The packet comes with a decent amount of treats for a smaller bird. My bird has loved them for years. The only occasional issue is the variation in size of the actual treats. Most of the time, they're a little bigger than the time of a pen, but sometimes they're about the size of an out of shell peanut. Luckily, that's not too big for my Quaker. Just be aware of that if you're intending to give these to a cockatiel or similar sized bird.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My bird's favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: My Cockatiel REALLY loves these yogurt treats! It is one of her favorite things that I add into her seed diet. Great price from this seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: My Conure's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My parrot loves this. I have tried so so many treats from different companies but nothing got close to this. This thing is her absolute favorite thing and I do not believe there is anything that can change that.
customer_reviews.author: Unboxer

customer_reviews.title: My birds don't like it
customer_reviews.text: This looks similar to other fruit snacks that my birds love so they went right after these but after a taste they wouldn't touch them again. Cockatiel and Canary wing both not interested in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: canaries and finches both have been nibbling on this
customer_reviews.text: I added the greens to a cup of easily digestible food for the birds, especially since I have a baby canary. All of the canaries have been eating out of the cup so I would say they like it.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Conure hatesssss it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Green cheek Conure. She is not a fan of it. It looks like it would be good and smells good but she doesn’t like it at allllll.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy D.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good value
customer_reviews.text: My bird is a sun conure and she does not like these. Give it a try hoping that she would.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lytle, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Great variety and flavor for my budgies. They love all the different textures.
customer_reviews.author: Review King & Queen

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: My bird loved it and yours will to amazing product good and perfect amount highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: My gal refuses to try this
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be a good enough quality, however, my finicky little Cockatiel will not even CONSIDER trying one. As any seasoned bird owner knows, it's always a cr_p shoot to try to expose your feathered pals to anything new. :)
customer_reviews.author: BirdWoman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was noticing a lot of bad comments about these treats but my conure absolutely loves them! He has liked fruity snacks over seeds though, but he can't seem to stop gobbling these up! They pieces were very decently sized, fresh, and colorful. At a local store, I end up spending over $6 for just one bag of these! Would recommend! Thankyou!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for Canaries but Not Parakeets
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 birds, one canary, and four parakeets. at first when I placed these treats in their food, they were understandably confused. But after a week or so, my canary started loving them. He ate all that he could get! On the other hand, my parakeets didn't enjoy it as much, they sometimes ate the smaller bits but other than that, they wanted nothing to do with them.
customer_reviews.author: Luma

customer_reviews.title: Parakeets love these
customer_reviews.text: My two birds love these treats. Simple and not messy. Highly suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Auggie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel didnt find it interesting. Sorry to say. It could be a picky eater because they smelled delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Bexa lext

customer_reviews.title: Best bird treats and good hand training treats
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my birds love this. My Canary, Nanday Conure and my Sun Conure go crazy for these treats. These are larger bags than you can get in pet stores and cheaper as well. I will be re-ordering them often to keep my feathered kiddo's happy
customer_reviews.author: mary e turner

customer_reviews.title: Birds won’t eat it, Budgies don’t like it
customer_reviews.text: This product was as described, it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Cockatiel won't touch them
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel won't eat these for the life of me.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your bird
customer_reviews.text: My AF DIDNT NOT LIKE THESE SO ITS TIRAL UP TO YOUR BIRDS TASTE
customer_reviews.author: Tina G.

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure if the bird is eating these or not
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if the bird is eating these or not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can give it a try. Maybe your birds are not a picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My love birds didn’t like it. They wouldn’t eat it
customer_reviews.author: Proudgeri

customer_reviews.title: My bird wouldn’t eat it.
customer_reviews.text: My bird didn’t like this and I bought 2 bags. The price was good. Size was like a sample packet.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Conures love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My conures love this on top of their normal food. It always makes them very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie lopez

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves them.
customer_reviews.text: For flavor, I didn’t taste it but my sun conure go nuts over this.
customer_reviews.author: G. Roman

customer_reviews.title: My bird HATES them.
customer_reviews.text: My bird HATES them. She literally throws them on the floor... 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: BRIGHT727

customer_reviews.title: My sun conures love them
customer_reviews.text: My sun conures absolutely love these and the price is great I love it is an add on
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smaller bag than expected.
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves these. Will be buying again. The bag was a little smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jess T.

customer_reviews.title: which is nice for smaller birds
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet is a bit of a picky eater, so he didn't seem too interested in these. But for the price, it was worth a shot! These are smaller chunks, which is nice for smaller birds.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great small treats
customer_reviews.text: My Hahn’s favorite treat. He’s very willing to cooperate with these as rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Battistoni

customer_reviews.title: Picky birds don't like
customer_reviews.text: My parakeets are extremely picky and I hoped they would like these so I would have a training treat. Nope. I'm sure they're good, but for my birds no good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bunnies say "YES"
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the cockatiel, who hates it, but the BUNNIES think I am giving them a special treat when I slip a little pinch into their food. So, if you are buying it for a bird, I can't guarantee that your pet will care much for it. If you are buying it for a rabbit or cavy, you'll probably be happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Hen

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: My budgie would not eat but might just be him
customer_reviews.author: marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Treat
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel Opal now screams from her cage if I open the bag of these. That's how much she loves them lol. Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Babyak

customer_reviews.title: he seems to really enjoy having a piece
customer_reviews.text: Picky cockatiel... He likes it one day, then won't eat it for a week. But, when he decides it's ok, he seems to really enjoy having a piece!
customer_reviews.author: Pretty.In.Ink

customer_reviews.title: Some birds must like these...just not my bird
customer_reviews.text: Nice amount of treats in the bag, my bird just won't eat them though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for your great bird
customer_reviews.text: My blue quaker parrot Ballou loves these treats. I don't give them often as he will not eat his regular food if he gets these treats. I use them for training purposes and just for special traits during the day. I highly recommend this specific treat as I've tried several other KT for treats and this is his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ballousmom

customer_reviews.title: Sun Conure loves this treat!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! My son's uses this product as a training treat and his Sun Conure loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap enough, wish they'd like them
customer_reviews.text: Neither my mccaw or my parakeet like these. Doesn't mean anyone else's wouldn't though. Great price & fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Stoll

customer_reviews.title: They're her favorite treat. The only thing is they're all diffeeent ...
customer_reviews.text: My sugar glider loves these. They're her favorite treat. The only thing is they're all diffeeent sizes, some of them are too small to hand to her, and some of them are big giant globs.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pete Loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My parrot loves these yogurt dipped treats! He's a picky eater, but he loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bird treat
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves it, soft and small size, great smell as well. The only treat my bird likes other than fresh fruits .
customer_reviews.author: REDBOX MASTER

customer_reviews.title: My birds like the taste.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a training aid. These are very small pieces, and really have to be held in the palm of your hand. Doesnt really work for what I wanted it for
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great treat!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our birds' food. I gave it to our Parakeets who ate all of it. The 4 Lovebirds ate most. It's a great treat to add to their daily food!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Birdy approved
customer_reviews.text: Birdys loved them. Bought them for my mothers budgies they loved them and are happy so that's all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Mrbaker

customer_reviews.title: at least we tried
customer_reviews.text: My birds didn't even touch this. We put it outside for others birds and no animal ate it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb York

customer_reviews.title: This snack is loved by a fussy-eating conure
customer_reviews.text: My son’s conure can be a little fussy with his food and treats but loves these treats. Instantly took it and it was gone. Loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Pet birds can't have dairy. Ingredients are awful. Returned these right away. These can potential kill pet birds.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fun flavor!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are a little big but I squish them before I feed them and he can’t get enough of this little treat
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: bird summer or anytime treats
customer_reviews.text: Great bird treats for parakeets my birds will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats for budgies!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Must taste great because all my 4 parakeets love them! They're gone before I turn around!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA A.

customer_reviews.title: My sun conure loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My sun conure goes nuts for these! all I have to do is shake the bag and she's running to her bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Bird crack
customer_reviews.text: This is like crack for my conure! A great treat to train your bird with!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Package deal was open upon inspection.. Will not be feeding this to my birds.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: If bird rejects at first keep trying
customer_reviews.text: My peach faced lovebird took about a week of tasting before deciding it loves them. Now I give them to it every few days as a morning treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product my Birds love.
customer_reviews.text: Parrolets love this stuff and sometimes hard to find locally. Will definitely be back to buy more. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: A-One

customer_reviews.title: ... just received this I'm gunna give them to my love birds I hope they like
customer_reviews.text: We just received this I'm gunna give them to my love birds I hope they like it
customer_reviews.author: LisaCassidy

customer_reviews.title: they are hands down his favorite treat.
customer_reviews.text: My Sun Conure loves these, they are hands down his favorite treat.
customer_reviews.author: CBlass

customer_reviews.title: a favorite of our cockatoo Tiki
customer_reviews.text: a favorite of our cockatoo Tiki..but I tried them too..they were like candy so maybe not to healthy for the bird
customer_reviews.author: Betty Ling

customer_reviews.title: Worth giving a try
customer_reviews.text: Got a mixed reaction from my 9 parrots...some loved them, others weren't interested...which is typical for birds, not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoo loves this and since it is small I can use it in her treat puzzle. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Gaughf

customer_reviews.title: Mango flavored yogurt dips
customer_reviews.text: This is my bird's favorite, but the last few that I ordered were just crumbs. Just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Looks appetizing for my Green Cheek Conure!!!
customer_reviews.text: My green cheek conure enjoys these treats a lot!!! Anna
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: My budgie loves these! The pieces are way too ...
customer_reviews.text: My budgie loves these! The pieces are way too big for a parakeet though, I had to crush it up.
customer_reviews.author: Momo Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unhealthy
customer_reviews.text: Has hydrogenated oil in it (trans fat), terrible for birds to digest .
customer_reviews.author: BabyZelda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Birds love them! Fast Shipping & packaged well. Highly recommended seller. Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.author: D. Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great bird treat!
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves her yogurt dipped papaya! I always sprinkle this on top of her seeds and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size and they love them so much
customer_reviews.text: We feed these to our sugar gliders that go nuts over them! They are the perfect size and they love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

product_meta.title: Kaytee Fiesta Mango Flavored Yogured Dipped Papaya Bird Treat
product_meta.description: Size:2.5 ozKaytee Yogurt Dipped Fruit treats blend extreme flavors, real fruit pieces and a creamy yogurt coating for a colorful explosion of taste and texture! These dipped treats are a wholesome, healthy way to give your pet a special treat.
feature_bullets: Dipped In Yogurt For Added Flavor
Increases Variety In Your Bird’S Diet For Appetite Stimulation And To Combat Boredom.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
